website_summaries.verdict: Fun design on the exterior of the kickball will appeal to youngsters at home or school.
pros: Distinctive ladybug design for kids to play with
Average sized kickball at 8.5" in diameter
Durable exterior material helps resist punctures
Surface has a tacky feel, making it easier to catch the ball

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these balls. They are super cute and you would think sturdy,however I had to replace two of these balls because of cracked surface and deflation. My 5 year old granddaughter did not play rough with these balls just bounced on patio. So for the price and the durability I would not recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy toddler ball
customer_reviews.text: This comes inflated which is a plus. Not really big but enough for little hands and feet. Surface is adorable and textured like a dodge ball so this is good for outdoor play as well as indoor. Ships fast and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Partially deflated.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad that this came partially deflated and is losing air quickly. It has also faded incredibly quickly, after a couple of months of being played with outside. I've gotten these balls without the inflation problem before, so I hope it's just a fluke. These are cute and fun otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Author Lindsay Swanberg

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This ball is cute but poorly made. We bought it in April and by August it had a tear in the seam. Our 2 year old used it but only a few times a week, at most. I would not recommend buying based on the poor quality construction
customer_reviews.author: M. McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 and 2 year old a month ago and it has already deflated. We have barely used it and not done any activities that would cause a hole. Very disappointed considering the price and the fact that the ball should be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gift for 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for a 1 year old boy, and it was his favorite, despite all the fancy cars and electronic games he plays with this constantly. A real winner! Not too big, but big enough to grow with him, bounces well but not too high with inflation that it comes with, and cute colors.
customer_reviews.author: JetBay

customer_reviews.title: Not dog friendly
customer_reviews.text: Reeeeally cute & looks exactly like the picture... I bought this because I thought the material would be thick enough so my dogs couldn’t pop it. They like to play kick ball lol but they busted this within 10 minutes of play. Yeah, they have sharp teeth, but other balls have lasted much longer. Not durable
customer_reviews.author: Kaity Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of the price you pay, at the end of the day its still just another ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball for my niece for $9 at the time of purchase. It has nice bright colors but had scuffs and minor imperfections on multiple spots. They weren't really noticeable unless you're examining it closely. At any rate my niece of course didn't notice these imperfections but for the price (especially the price at the time of my review $16) you'd expect it to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great ball and a great size.
customer_reviews.text: This ball is as adorable as it looks. It is not too big. I have a three year old great niece and she loves it. She just likes to carry it around. I have ordered another to stay at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Two in a row sprang a leak!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball as a replacement for another Melissa & Doug ball that had sprung a leak. I thought it was my mistake on the first one because I had left it out in freezing weather. But this one sprang a leak only three weeks later! There are far less expensive balls out there that last forever! I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher White

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So cute and a great quality ball for my toddler
customer_reviews.author: Slayer I45

customer_reviews.title: Too cute, grand daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This ball is adorable and light enough for a two year old to toss and kick.
customer_reviews.author: Born to Travel

customer_reviews.title: Darling ball!
customer_reviews.text: Melissa & Doug make the best educational toys! This ball is darling! My grandchildren used it in the pool, but can be used anywhere - indoors and out. It is the perfect weight and of a good quality. Will continue to purchase Melissa & Doug!
customer_reviews.author: DGDaven

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and design but you can find it cheaper in Marshalls
customer_reviews.author: Susana Anacleto-Lupianez

customer_reviews.title: Toddler's Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: A very favorite toy of our 16 month old great granddaughter, even sleeps with it.
customer_reviews.author: rogeredrake

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my grandkids and might I add...ADORABLE LADYBUG BALL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hole within 30 min
customer_reviews.text: Hole within 30 min will patch up and try to use it. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Made in China strikes again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball for Easter on April 2nd for my daughter and within days it started to deflate. We re-inflated, it deflated. Upon closer examination there is a faulty seam that is leaking air. Cannot be used, a total waste. Update to this review: After contacting Melissa and Doug they contacted me and replaced this with a comparable toy. They were very nice and professional to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent Jallais

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is nowhere as cute as pictured... It looks like cheap rubber. There is no packaging to speak of as the ball came on its own and worse part about it... There was a split/ tear right at the seam-- no wonder the annoying thing kept deflating...went straight into the garbage! Didn't expect this kind of quality from Melisa. And Doug company-- usually their products are a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Anj

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after 2 uses!
customer_reviews.text: Looked adorable and my 18-month daughter loved it when it arrived. She carried it around, kicked it, ran after it... Perfect size, weight, design, and softness for her age. Then it rained for a couple weeks so we didn't use it. When we finally took it to the park again, we realized it was half-deflated. Tried inflating it again but it started deflating within minutes. The durability of this product is non-existent and buying it was a complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymously

customer_reviews.title: Adorable design, but broke first time we played with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids (1 & 3) and I think it is the most adorable ball I have ever seen. However, after playing with it for a single day, it has cracks in it and is deflating. I'm very disappointed in the quality. I LOVE LOVE LOVE Melissa & Doug products and they are usually amazing, so this is a big disappointment. I recommend you pass on this and go for durability over design.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica White

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: It came pumped up and ready to use! It's been about 8 months since we bought it and it works great still, hardly any wear or tear.
customer_reviews.author: melaina townley

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't lost it bounce
customer_reviews.text: This ball is so cute! My daycare kids love it! Gets played with everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roule

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was slightly bigger
customer_reviews.text: A good looking ball. Just wish it was slightly bigger - similar to what my daughter previously had.
customer_reviews.author: A Doshi

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s my kid anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Pumped these up and blasted my 2 year old with them. Kid is TERRIBLE at dodging, and don’t even get me started on his catching skills.
customer_reviews.author: RobynzxFifezi

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter's first "big ball" which she loves. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's first "big ball" which she loves. It's bouncy but not as hard as the playground balls of the bigger kids. It's lightweight so she can "toss" it, and big enough for her to practice sitting on. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: L. Degn

customer_reviews.title: Nice, cute and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. The recipient loves this and enjoys playing with it. A very well made ball that will last a while and is cute and durable enough to be enjoyed as the child grows.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good value
customer_reviews.text: Love these Melissa and Doug kickballs, they have been a favorite toy for all of my kids.
customer_reviews.author: jiminy

customer_reviews.title: My twin daughters love this. The colors are vibrant
customer_reviews.text: My twin daughters love this. The colors are vibrant, the ball is soft and very well made. You can't go wrong with this product for children. My daughters are 17 months old
customer_reviews.author: Alfons C.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fun ball. Average sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this ball. It is really cute. She played with it until it got a hole in it, about 3-4 months later. It has average sturdiness, to any other playground balls. I would say it is good, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Faded fast and not durable. I love Melissa and Doug toys this one was disappointing didn't hold up outside.
customer_reviews.author: CB smith

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Colors faded very quickly and the ball has developed large cracks in it, all in the course of one summer.
customer_reviews.author: imanurse

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball is a good size, a little too big for an 18 month-old, but it is great for a toddler a little older. My daughter is 18 months and loves it. The only thing I've noticed is that the paint is coming off due to the fact that she is playing around with the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Nane Jamkotchian

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for both boys and girls
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Great kickball for both boys and girls (even though this is technically part of the girl kickball set). Sturdy and a bit heavier so good for the park and/or windy days.
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought and the kids popped it too
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Booth

customer_reviews.title: Cute ball, was a tad flat on air though.
customer_reviews.text: Cute ball that my kids love. I will agree with other reviewers who said the ball was a tad flat, kids still love it though!
customer_reviews.author: Jillicious

customer_reviews.title: The outdoor toy for Grandma
customer_reviews.text: Technically, my granddaughter loves it - we play outside with this all the time. Sturdy, colorful, and perfect for a 5 year old and a 67 year old...
customer_reviews.author: Maureen W. Vavra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is learning sports with this ball that she loves and can't stop playing with.
customer_reviews.author: M Carolin

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT - DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: We got this ball for my daughter for Christmas only to discover it had a hole in it when we pumped it up. We exchanged it for another one only to find it, too, had a similar hole in it. Amazon was fantastic with the exchange, but I would recommend you stay away from this product unless you want your child playing with a flat ball.
customer_reviews.author: M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I bought this for my 8 month old daughter she loves it, crawls all over the house chasing it, my 5 year old son also love it, i thought it would be a little smaller but it is big as described, Great size for kids
customer_reviews.author: Brook Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My two year old grandson loved it. He wants to play ball like his older brothers...so this ball was different and fun for him. He knew right away that was his special ball....all his own.
customer_reviews.author: nanajcw

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive but it was a specific request from a grandchild. Kind of overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 month old grandchild loves rolling this on the floor. It's very colorful and it's one thing she can't put in her mouth!!
customer_reviews.author: W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Bad smell, it's a ball so it does the job, but wish the smell wasn't so harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: the ball was flat when it got to me. The rubber was cracked at the seam and don't hold air
customer_reviews.text: the ball was flat when it got to me. The rubber was cracked at the seam and don't hold air
customer_reviews.author: Ron W.

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, but not as bouncy as I would like...
customer_reviews.text: This is great ball for kicking and rolling. However, when it comes to bouncing - hardly bounces at all. I know that it is a "kicking" ball, but it is kind of difficult concept to explain to a child who is used to ball "doing it all".
customer_reviews.author: Olga Kochar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Colors are bright and the ball is a good size. Great gift for my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: A66eyroad

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! My daughter loves it! It’s exactly as pictured and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: drobb

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This has held up very well. A very thick and good quality ball. No problems! And very cute!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: fun with exercise
customer_reviews.text: Quality with flair! Super cute ball that makes aerobics class and exercise in general more fun for adults and kids.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for outdoor fun with daddy. Color faded after leaving it outdoors a couple days though.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Watson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A very good ball for young toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my Christmas gifts for our little 1 year old grand-daughter. She absolutely loved it - to the delight of her grandparents. It brought us joy all round last Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tukkie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ball with nice texture
customer_reviews.text: Really nice ball. Good size for babies to play, has a fun ladybug and the texture is nice to the feel. My 13 month daughter loves it! In fact, when we go play at a local park many other children want to play with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my one year old twins. After minimal outdoor use, they are both flat :(
customer_reviews.author: Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball, but didn`t last long
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ball as it was nicely colorful. But after a few days, we find it softer and softer as the seam was not so good. I did not return it as the shipping price would be probably more then new ball.
customer_reviews.author: Tereza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ball is perfect. It's exactly what you think of when you think classic kick ball. But adorable!
customer_reviews.author: HeidiM

customer_reviews.title: Cute Ball
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors and good size. I had the turtle version and it didn't hold air well. This one has been fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Quinnched

customer_reviews.title: Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great and durable kickball for the young ones. They love the designs much better than a plain solid color ball.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: A cute ball turns into a piece of garabe after 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute ball. However, the quality is... 'oh my god' bad! I purchased it in mid March, it has cracked and started to deflate in May. My kids play with it only when they're home from school. It didn't even have too much wear and tear. One day I notice that it's a bit deflated. I thought I just needed to pump it again, and found out there are MULTIPLE cracks!! This is so bad in quality and it's past the return time limit. So sad.... So, don't waste your money on it if you plan to use it for longer than... 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old really likes this ball, big hit! It was a tiny bit smelly out of the box, but it has held up to toddler energy so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. klieman

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Definite win for us on the choice of "surprises" for our granddaughter. Saw this at other places and bought it on line. Turns out today that the least expensive place to get one is at our local grocery store. wow.
customer_reviews.author: P. Morales

customer_reviews.title: After I spent more on the cheap thin plastic balls trying to replace them when they pooped I decided to get a kick ball like we
customer_reviews.text: My two year old daughter LOVES this ball. One of her friends got a butterfly one and she wanted on too. After I spent more on the cheap thin plastic balls trying to replace them when they pooped I decided to get a kick ball like we had in school in hopes the it would last longer. It came fully inflated and ready to play with. Super cute lady but design. We use it for just about any game now. Her favorite is basket ball and because it bounces more she can make a few baskets on her own completely on accident. This would make an awesome birthday present too!
customer_reviews.author: dodgemama

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute ball. Just don't leave it outside. The color fades. It's a little heavy for my daughter., but it is a kick ball!
customer_reviews.author: Genifah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ball was cute, kind of heavy though. But didn't last the summer, the $1 balls I buy at Kroger last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: 2girlsmom

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter had this ball for 5 years and she liked if do much
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this ball for 5 years and she liked if do much, we had go replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly C

customer_reviews.title: Kickball
customer_reviews.text: The kickball will be a good way to teach my little great-niece how to kick a ball and will be very fun for her. I'm sure she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: kss

customer_reviews.title: It's a super cute and high quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a super cute and high quality. I bought it for my daughter's 2nd birthday and she absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lady Bug
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my granddaughter. She loves it and was so glad to have her very own ball. She knew right away that it was a ladybug. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball came well aired up, cute as the picture and my daughter loves it. We haven't had it for too long but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Turnbow

customer_reviews.title: Lisa
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute ball and my daughter plays with it quite a bit. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this cute little ball. It's our 15 months olds 1st ball. She's not super interested in it yet as a kick ball. She just pick a it up and walks around with it. My husband on the other hand plays hard with this ball. From the other reviewers mentioning durability, I'm surprised he hasn't popped it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Mad at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time that i received a package from amazon broken where's the quality control system???? do you have one??? terrible The ball is beautiful, and my baby loved it, she still can play with it....... but it's new and broken
customer_reviews.author: Gaston Martinez de Hoz

customer_reviews.title: Our 4-year-old granddaughter also loved it and wanted one for herself
customer_reviews.text: Bought for youngest granddaughter's 1st birthday. The ball is heavy enough that it doesn't roll too far for a child who is just starting to walk. Our 4-year-old granddaughter also loved it and wanted one for herself. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BJLN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and bouncy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and bouncy! Great for both my 1 1/2 year old and 4 year old to play with. Perfect size... Is durable yet bouncy. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small children and a lady who had a spot removed from her nose. Helps arthritic hands too;
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J Hoisington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been in use for about 2 weeks and still going strong. 2 year old adores it!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent... BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, very nice the item... BUT... The shipping cost me more than the cost of the items that the box was too big, very big , less than half of the box was enough.
customer_reviews.author: Enma Viloria

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for toddlers. Brightly colored & fun. Tough, except if you have a dog with big teeth😢
customer_reviews.author: gina a.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable ladybug!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old granddaughter. We call her ladybug. She loves to roll and kick it around.
customer_reviews.author: Penny D. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Melissa & Doug Sunny Patch Bollie Kickball-  cute as ever
customer_reviews.text: this is the cutest ball I've seen. My granddaughter loves it. I am so glad I selected this for her....
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kickball for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball for my daughter's first birthday. She and her toddler playmates love to play with it indoors and out. This is a toy that will grow with her.
customer_reviews.author: S. Camburides

customer_reviews.title: Cute ball, but got punctured after not much use.
customer_reviews.text: After about four months of play, this ball got a hole in it and deflated. Play consisted of rolling, bouncing, and some very elementary catch with a child under two, so it's not that it was roughed up. Disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Daumer

customer_reviews.title: 26 month old granddaughter likes this ball a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Our 26 month old granddaughter likes this ball a lot! She plays with it every day and likes to sit on it also!
customer_reviews.author: NPB - Atlanta, Ga

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Sunny Patch Bollie Ladybug Classic Rubber Kickball
product_meta.description:
Bollie the ladybug will add colorful excitement to classic early catching and kicking games. Made of durable rubber, this playground ball is great for backyard fun or for playing games in the park.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: Ladybug ball is perfect for throwing, catching, kicking and bouncing activities
Classic ball for playground or backyard games

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
